message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $150 is already a competitive price for this item.  Could you meet me halfway at $125?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $100 would be a fair price for the product. Would you be able to meet me at $100?
